title: Wikipedia: Karuta

title: Wikipedia: Anime
abstract: Anime () , plural: anime|lead=yes}} is a style of hand-drawn and computer animation originating in, and commonly associated with, Japan

title: Wikipedia: Akihabara
abstract: is a common name for the area around Akihabara Station in the Chiyoda ward of Tokyo, Japan. Administratively, the area called Akihabara mainly belongs to the  and Kanda-Sakumach≈ç districts in Chiyoda

title: Wikipedia: Anemometer
abstract: An anemometer is a device used for measuring the speed of wind, and is also a common weather station instrument. The term is derived from the Greek word anemos, which means wind, and is used to describe any wind speed  instrument used in meteorology
